summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue South, from Horton Street to a point 200 feet south thereof; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 92283 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
